page.title: 18SPORTING ACTIVITIES
page.content: { SPORTING ACTIVITIES} Sport plays an important part in Trefonen life. {CRICKET}is very popular both with men and children.They practice each Tuesday evening and play matches on Sundays the cricket team have teas in the village hall. {FOOTBALL}is played by the younger men in Trefonen.They use the village field and play home and away matches.On Wednesday the younger boys are given football coaching.Also on the village field people play rounders and skittles.In the local pub there is a good darts team and snooker is also popular pastime.
